title: Fugue of the Fallen
data: {{version031}} {{stub}} {{spell info}} '''Fugue of the Fallen''' is a level 3 [[Necromancy]] spell that gives you a [[slaying]] bonus when you or your allies kill monsters. ==Useful Info== Grants the '''Fugue''' status. Each time you or an ally kill a monster while this status is active, you gain a +1 [[slay]]ing bonus. This stacks up to 7 slaying in total. The status also creates loud [[noise]]s. If you are at the maximum of 7 slaying, you additionally deal 2d(3 + power/25) [[negative energy]] damage to all enemies adjacent to the target.{{source ref|0.31.0|spl-selfench.cc|206}} The status lasts for 24 + (1d[[spellpower|power]] + 1d(pow + 1))/2 turns.{{source ref|0.31.0|spl-selfench.cc|176}} If you recast the spell, the duration resets, but the slaying bonus also resets. ==Strategy== *The bonus works with [[Kikubaaqudgha]]'s Unearth Wretches. ==History== *Fugue of the Fallen was introduced in [[0.31]], replacing [[Wereblood]]. ==References==
